username.title: Username
username.description: A username to Atlassian Cloud; usually an email.

#token.title: API Token
#token.description:
An API token to Atlassian Cloud.
A token can be generated in manage your account section.

organization_id.title: Organization ID
organization_id.description: An ID of the organization, for which the data will be downloaded. Can be found in the first part of the URL, i.e. https://<organization_id>.atlassian.net.

organization_url.title: Organization URL
organization_url.description: URL which will be used to download data from your organization.

since.title: Date Range
since.description: Date, since when the data will be downloaded. Can be specified absolutely (e.g. '2020-01-01') or relatively (e.g. '2 days ago', '1 month ago').
